channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Avalanche
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Avalanche

item.title: CVE-2024-25000|2024-04-19T01:10:12.506Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.
